metadata.name: Business Intelligence Agent Golden Test Dataset
metadata.description: Comprehensive test dataset for evaluating agent tool selection and response quality, including complex multi-tool chains, comparative analysis, negative test cases, ambiguous queries, and tool stress tests

Includes review dates and star ratings
Provides direct quotes as evidence
Filters results to be recent and relevant
